ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control
ModMetaData.author: VouLT
ModMetaData.description:
Bulk assignment of colonists and animals to outfits, areas, drugs, food, work in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.
Features: - Policies presets for Work, Schedule, Assign and Animal tabs - Default outfits, food, drugs when colonist, prisoners or slaves join your colony - Emergency' button to toggle your configured policies at once in one click or keyboard shorcut
v2.3.6
Mod Integrations List: - Fluffly's Work Tab without extended priorities (only 1.3+) - Fluffly's Animal Tab (only 1.3+) - Numbers (only 1.3+) - Combat Extended - Assign Animal Food - Children, school and learning
